Member Function Documentation

DzDeviceFrame * DzDevice::getOptionsFrame (  )  const [virtual]

Gets the options interface for a Device. Subclasses should reimplement this function to return a new instance of the options interface for the Device. The default implementation always returns NULL.

Returns:
A pointer to the options interface, NULL if no interface is available. The caller takes ownership of this pointer and is responsible for deleting it.
void DzDevice::setSettings ( const DzSettings &  settings  )  [pure virtual, slot]

Changes the current settings for the device.

Parameters:
settings The new settings for the device.
